thread.title: Matt Damon against Ben Affleck-Jennifer Garner compromise; ‘Batman v Superman’ on-screen character back with Jennifer Lopez?

author: CanIndia News Service 1
title: Matt Damon against Ben Affleck-Jennifer Garner compromise; ‘Batman v Superman’ on-screen character back with Jennifer Lopez?
text:
0 0 0 0 0 
Los Angeles, October 10 (CINEWS): Ben Affleck and Jennifer Garner relationship status stories are getting excessively confounded. At any rate passing by different reports on the Internet, fans are left to think about whether the couple is really separated or wanting to make it work. Yet, the most recent buzz recommends that “Batman v Superman” star’s closest companion Matt Damon is entirely against compromise arranges. 
While we have been listening to reports that Ben and Jen are working towards repairing their broken marriage, it would appear that there is somebody who is not in the couple’s support getting back together. What’s more, if a report in OK! is to trusted, then that individual is none other that Ben’s bestie Matt Damon. Obviously, “The Martian” on-screen character never enjoyed Jennifer Garner and was incredulous about the marriage even before Ben Affleck’s undertaking with babysitter Christine Ouzounian became known. 
“Matt trusts Ben’s marriage was in shambles route before the babysitter. There was a lot of indignation there,” a source said. 
The report further expressed that however Matt wasn’t pushing Ben to end his relationship, he emphatically trusted that the “Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice” performing artist would do be much more satisfied with another lady. 
“Damon, who has been companions with Affleck since their adolescence, felt as though Garner simply relaxed up a bit, things could have been diverse,” the source included. Related Posts
